SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board

Class TileSpace

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.TileSpace
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardSpace
public class TileSpace extends Object implements BoardSpace
This class represents a single space on the game board and is responsible for containing the tile placed on that space.

The class has three states:

  • Active empty: the space allows for the placement of new tiles in the space;
  • Active full: the space does not allow the placement of new tiles and continues storing the current one;
  • Inactive empty: the space does not allow for the placement of any tile.
The state "Inactive full" is not possible since an inactive space cannot be used to store tiles.
